definitions.definition: To consider, look upon (something) in a given way etc.
definitions.example: He regards honesty as a duty.

definitions.definition: To take notice of, pay attention to.
To have to do with, to concern.
definitions.example: That argument does not regard the question.

definitions.definition: To set store by (something), to hold (someone) in esteem; to consider to have value, to respect.
